statements: SELECT name, region FROM sales_representatives
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives WHERE commission_rate > 0.05
SELECT id, name, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'West'
SELECT name FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY commission_rate DESC
SELECT id, name, region, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'North' ORDER BY name DESC, commission_rate ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives WHERE commission_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY region ASC, name ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives WHERE commission_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY commission_rate DESC
SELECT name, SUM(commission_rate) AS total_commission FROM sales_representatives GROUP BY name HAVING SUM(commission_rate) > 2 ORDER BY total_commission DESC
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM sales_representatives WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY region
SELECT * FROM visits;
SELECT customer_id, rep_id FROM visits WHERE visit_date = '2023-05-12';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date < '2023-06-01';
SELECT visit_id, customer_id, visit_date FROM visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM visits WHERE rep_id = 1;
SELECT visit_id, customer_id, visit_date FROM visits WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visit_id, rep_id, customer_id, visit_date FROM visits JOIN feedback ON visits.visit_id = feedback.visit_id;
SELECT feedback.feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date, visit_date FROM feedback JOIN visits ON feedback.visit_id = visits.visit_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rep_id, COUNT(visit_id) AS num_visits FROM visits GROUP BY rep_id ORDER BY num_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesRepresentative;
SELECT name, email FROM SalesRepresentative ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT visit_id, representative_id, visit_date FROM CustomerVisit WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesPerformance GROUP BY representative_id;
SELECT representative_id, AVG(amount) AS average_sale FROM SalesPerformance GROUP BY representative_id ORDER BY average_sale DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesRepresentative;
SELECT name, email FROM SalesRepresentative WHERE id = 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM CustomerVisit;
SELECT representative_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM SalesPerformance GROUP BY representative_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerVisit ORDER BY visit_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT name, email FROM sales_representatives WHERE representative_id = 'f6ba9324-7e38-45e0-afd9-77c343adbb82';
SELECT representative_id, phone_number FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY representative_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT representative_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_performance GROUP BY representative_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_representatives ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT representative_id, name, email FROM sales_representatives WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT representative_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM customer_visits GROUP BY representative_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY visit_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE rep_id = 3 AND sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT feedback_details FROM feedback WHERE rep_id = 2 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT rep_id, rep_name, rep_email FROM reps;
SELECT * FROM visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_purpose FROM visits WHERE rep_id = 3 AND visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT rep_name, rep_email, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM reps JOIN visits ON reps.rep_id = visits.rep_id GROUP BY reps.rep_id;
SELECT feedback_details FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
